name: JaliCoreRuleMessages
description: Notification messages defined by the Jali Core package for standard validation rules.

messages.name: RequiredValue
messages.template: ${propertyNames === null ? "A value is required." : "The value${propertyNames.length > 1 ? "s" : ""} '${propertyNames.join()}'" ${propertyNames.length > 1 ?
